#**期中作業題目**
    - 使用 ggplot2 與任意資料繪製散佈圖，線圖，直方圖，盒鬚圖與長條圖 
    - 將程式上傳至 GitHub


##**散佈圖**
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(trees,aes(x=Girth,y=Height))+ 
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle(" Girth vs.Height of Trees") +
  xlab('Girth')+
  ylab("Height")
```

##**線圖**
```{r}
ggplot(pressure,aes(x=temperature,y=pressure))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()+
  ggtitle("Vapor Pressure of Mercury as a Function of Temperature")
```

##**直方圖**
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x =Petal.Length)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30)
```

##**盒鬚圖**
```{r}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x =manufacturer, y = hwy)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

##**長條圖**
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Width)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = Species), position = "fill") +
  ylab("Percentage")
```
